subject: Refund request - order #A123
body: Hi, I was charged twice for order A123. Please refund the duplicate charge. Attached is my receipt. Thanks.

subject: Billing question
body: Hello, I see a subscription charge I don't recognize. Can you tell me what it's for and how to cancel?

subject: App crashes on save
body: Steps to reproduce: 1) Open app 2) Create note 3) Click save -> app freezes and closes. Happened twice on Windows 11.

subject: Interested in volume pricing
body: Hi, we're evaluating your product for our team of 50. Can you share enterprise pricing and SLA details?

subject: Can't access my account
body: I reset my password but the confirmation link says 'invalid token'. Email: sara@customers.com

subject: Feature request: CSV export
body: It would be great to have a CSV export for reports, with date and user columns. Any plans to add this?

subject: You won a prize!
body: "Congratulations! You've won a free iPhone. Click http://bad.example to claim."

subject: Very unhappy with support
body: I've been waiting 10 days and no resolution. My project is delayed and this is unacceptable. I want a manager to respond.

subject: Refund follow-up - order #B456
body: I was promised a refund last week for order B456 but haven't received it. Please advise status.

subject: UI bug: misaligned buttons
body: On the settings page, the Save and Cancel buttons overlap on smaller screens. Screenshot attached.
